thread.title: Buchanan defense rises up in narrow win over Berrien
thread.title_full: Buchanan defense rises up in narrow win over Berrien

author: Jack Walkden South Bend Tribune
title: Buchanan defense rises up in narrow win over Berrien
text:
Previous Next Buchanan defense rises up in narrow win over Berrien 
Buchanan’s Dalton Riddle gets tackled by Berrien Springs’ Greg Piedt in their high school football game Friday in Berrien Springs. SBT Photo/GREG SWIERCZ Buchanan defense rises up in narrow win over Berrien 
Buchanan's Tim McCaffery, right, carries the ball against Greg Peidt of Berrien Springs Friday in Berrien Springs. SBT Photo/GREG SWIERCZ Posted: Saturday, October 17, 2015 6:00 am | Updated: 6:42 am, Sat Oct 17, 2015. 
BERRIEN SPRINGS – All season long Buchanan's prolific offense has grabbed the headlines. 
After all the Bucks had averaged 45.4 points and 429.0 yards in their first seven games. Subscription Required An online service is needed to view this article in its entirety.
